text: Youku Games Privacy Protection Guidelines
Update date: April 2, 2022
label: Policy Change

text: Effective date: April 2, 2022
label: Policy Change

text: You are welcome to choose Youku game provided by Youku Shengshi Technology (Beijing) Co., Ltd. (hereinafter referred to as "We")!

In addition to the "Youku Privacy Policy", we will also further refine the situation of "Youku Game Privacy Protection Guide" ("Big Guideline").And the relevant rights and other matters you enjoy, this guidance is part of the "Youku Game License and Service Agreement". The main points are as follows:
We know the importance of personal information to you and do our best to protect your personal information security.

We specially formulate this policy so that you can understand how we collect, store, protect, use, and share your personal information, and how you can manage your personal information so that you can make better choices.

Before you start using our product or/and service, please be sure to read and understand this policy carefully. In particular, you should focus on reading the terms of our bold/down line logo to ensure that you fully understand and consent.Services.
You know and agree: You clicks to agree with this policy, or if you use or continue to use our services, you say you agree to accept the constraints of this policy.
label: Policy Change
Important
rewrite: You clicks to agree with this policy, or if you use or continue to use your service, all indicate that you authorize this policy.

text: Unless you have read and accepted all the contents of this policy, you have no right to use the service of Youku's prosperity.
label: Policy Change

text: If you have any questions about this "Privacy Policy" and its related matters, please contact us, and we will answer you as soon as possible.

If you are a minor under the age of 18 (especially children under 14 years of age or those who are not a complete civil behavior), you need to read this policy accompanied by your guardian, and obtain your guardian to this policyAfter the consent of all clauses, use the service of Youku Shengshi.
label: Policy Change
Specific Audiences
Important
rewrite: If you are a minor, please use our services after your parents or other guardians read this policy carefully.

text: 1. How do we collect and use your information
In the process of using Youku Shengshi application services, we need/may collect and use your following personal information to provide you and optimize our services.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
rewrite: We need/may collect and use your personal information to provide and optimize services.

text: If we want to use your personal information for other purposes that are not stated in this policy, or use the information collected for other purposes based on specific purposes, we will inform you in a reasonable way, and before useGet your consent
label: Important
Usage
rewrite: If your personal information is used in other purposes outside of the policy that has not been stated or agreed in advance, we will inform you and ask your consent again.

text: We collect and use your personal information mainly include the following two: the following:
label: First Party Collection Information

text: 1. In order to provide you with the information necessary to provide you with the core business functions of our products and/or services: this kind of information is a necessary information for the normal operation of the product and/or the service, you must authorize us to collect it.
label: First Party Collection Information

text: If you refuse to provide, you will not be able to use our products and/or services normally;
label: First Party Collection Information

text: 2. In order to provide you with additional business functions to our products and/or services that may need to be collected: You can choose whether to authorize us to collect this type of information.
label: First Party Collection Information

text: If you refuse to provide it, you will not be able to use related additional functions normally or cannot achieve the functional effects we intend to achieve, but it does not affect your normal use of core business functions.
label: First Party Collection Information

text: 1.1 Help you complete registration and login

In order to facilitate us to provide you with continuous and stable services and ensure your security of Youku service, we need you to provide basic registration or login information, including account nicknames and passwords, user avatars, mobile phone numbers, e -mail.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
rewrite: We will collect your basic registration or login information to provide services.

text: The above information is a must -have information for your registered and logging in Youku user account or using the core business of Youku Shengshi service. If you choose not, you may not be able to use our service.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
rewrite: Basic registration or login information is necessary to use basic services.

text: If you use WeChat, QQ, and (or) accounts on a third -party platform as a game account associated to log in to the cool age, in order to provide you with a better game service and improve the game experience, we will obtain the third -party account based on your authorizationThe relevant information (including third -party accounts, user names, nicknames, avatars, and other information you authorize, shall prevail with a third -party account authorization page).
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
rewrite: When registering and logging in with a third -party account, visit and collect your personal information after your authorization.

text: If you refuse to authorize such information, you will not be able to log in to our game services with an account on a third -party platform, but it will not affect the normal use of other products and services we provide.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
rewrite: If you refuse to authorize the relevant information under the third -party account, you cannot use the account to log in to the game, but it does not affect the use of other products or services.

text: 1.2 Implement identity authentication

In order to meet the requirements of laws, regulations, policies and relevant competent authorities, you need to register real -name registration to use the service of Youku Shengshi. We will collect your personal identity information (including names, including names, including name, including your consent or actively provided by your active provision.ID number), biometric information (static or dynamic facial features) to complete identity authentication;
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
Usage
rewrite: We will collect personal identity information and biometric information provided by you to complete identity certification.

text: If you use a third -party account to associate with the cool world service, after you have authorized, we may obtain your above information from the third party, and collect the above information to complete identity certification.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
Usage
rewrite: If you log in with a third -party account, we have authorized to collect your personal identity information and biometric information from a third party to complete the identity authentication.

text: Collecting the above information is used to complete the real -name authentication. The real -name identity information you provided is compared with the authoritative data platform data source.
label: Important
Usage
rewrite: Collect your personal identity information and biometric information to complete real -name authentication.

text: If you do not provide the above information, it may cause you to be unable to log in to Youku's prosperous age, or be subject to corresponding restrictions during the use of Youku's prosperity.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
rewrite: If you do not provide personal identity information and biometric information, you may lead to restrictions on your use.

text: In order to meet the needs of user identity, guarantee system and service security, and other specific service functions (including account unbinding), we may need you to provide real identity information (including name, ID number), biometric information (static or dynamic or dynamic information (static or dynamic or dynamicFacial features) to complete identity authentication.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
Usage
rewrite: We may need you to provide real identity information and biometric information to complete your identity authentication.

text: If you do not provide the above information, we will not be able to provide you with related functions and services.

In order to achieve the purpose of identity certification, you agree and authorize us to provide, query, and check your aforementioned identity information provided by the relevant identity authentication agencies (including personal credit reporting agencies, government departments and other agencies) in the third direction.
label: Third Party Sharing/ Disclosure
Important
First Party Collection Information
rewrite: You agree and authorize us to provide, inquire, and check your identity information on our own identity certification agencies in the third direction.

text: Please note that your personal identity information and biometric information are personal sensitive information. Please provide it with caution. If you refuse to provide you, you will not be able to obtain related services, but it will not affect the normal use of other functions and services.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
rewrite: If you refuse to provide personal identity information and biometric information, it will not be able to obtain related services, but it does not affect the use of other functions.

text: 1.3 Normal operation, optimization and improvement of our services or providing you with security guarantees

1.3.1 In order to maintain the normal and stable operation of the basic functions of the game, we need to obtain the permissions of the external storage of the read/write to the device, and obtain the above permissions and information for the installation storage and reading game archives and files of the game products in the device (Including the necessary game processes and cache, writing/download/save/modify pictures, documents, files, collapse log information and other necessary information).
label: Permission Acquisition
Important
Usage
rewrite: We need to obtain the permissions of the external storage of reading/writing the device for installing storage and reading game archives and files.

text: If you refuse to provide the aforementioned permissions, it may cause you to be unable to use our related products and/or services.
label: Permission Acquisition
Important
rewrite: If you refuse to provide the permissions of the external storage of reading/writing the device, it may cause related products or services to be inaccurate.

text: 1.3.2 In order to verify the account information, ensure your account security and advertising data monitoring and verification, it also creates a fair, healthy and safe game environment to combat the behavior of destroying the fair environment or interference of the game, and the normal conduct of game services. WeWill collect your gaming application information, equipment information (only device recognition symbols, equipment serial numbers, equipment manufacturers, equipment names, equipment types and versions, equipment models, equipment styles, equipment MAC addresses), network identity information (IP address IP address), Hardware and operating system information, application lists, process information, network environment information and game crash records.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
Usage
rewrite: We will collect your game application information, device information, network identity information, hardware and operating system information, application lists, process information, network environment information and game crash records to ensure the normal operation of the game.

text: We may use your IP address recognition device to connect to the location of the Internet to achieve the content of specific activities.
label: Important
Usage
rewrite: We may use your IP address recognition device to connect to the location of the Internet.

text: 1.3.3 When you use Youku Shengshi Service, we will collect your game log information, including login logs, items logs, shop purchase logs, activities logs, guild logs, upgrade logs, chat logs, game pairs information, games, games, gamesDating records and other log information generated during the process of using Youku Shengshi.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
rewrite: When you use Youku Shengshi service, we will collect your game log information.

text: We collect the above information for game operation statistical analysis, customer complaint processing, game anti -cheating analysis, and other game experience optimization analysis. At the same time, it is convenient for you to view your game history records on the game client;
label: Important
Usage
rewrite: We collect game log information for game operation statistical analysis, customer complaint processing, game anti -cheating analysis and other game experience optimization analysis.

text: If you refuse to provide the aforementioned information, it may cause you to be unable to use our related products and/or services.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
rewrite: If you refuse to provide game log information, it may cause related products and/or services to be inaccurate.

text: 1.3.4 When you use the consumption function in the game, we will collect your transaction information, including recharge records, consumption records and other necessary information related to transaction. We collect the aforementionThe degree guarantees the safety of your virtual items. When the transaction is controversial, it provides customer service personnel with information to support disputes.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
rewrite: When you use the consumption function in the game, we will collect your transaction information to query transaction records, ensure the safety of virtual items, and support disputes.

text: The recharge records and consumption records are personal sensitive information. Collecting the above information is necessary to achieve the consumption function of Youku Shengshi, otherwise the transaction will not be completed.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
rewrite: Collecting recharge records and consumption records is necessary for consumption functions to achieve the service of Youku Shengshi.

text: 1.4 Provide you with customer service or other user response services

When you contact our customer service or use other users to respond to functional services (such as selling after -sale after sale, personal information protection complaints or suggestions, other customer complaints and needs), we may need you to provide the necessary personal information to match and verify youUser identity to ensure your account and system security.
label: Data Security
Important
First Party Collection Information
rewrite: When you contact our customer service, we may need you to provide the necessary personal information to verify the identity.

text: In order to facilitate contact with you or help you solve problems or send gifts, we may also need you to provide your name, mobile phone number, email and other contact information and personal information.
label: Important
Usage
rewrite: We need to collect your name, mobile phone number, email and other contact information and personal information for contacting or sending gifts.

text: We may also save your contact information, your communication information (including text, pictures, audio and video, call records) and other necessary information associated with your needs. The aforementioned information is personal sensitive information.The information is to help you solve the problem. If you refuse to provide the above information, we may not be able to feedback or effectively solve the problem in time.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
Usage
rewrite: We may also save your contact information, your communication information and other necessary information to help you solve the problem.

text: In order to provide reasonable needs of services and improve service quality, other information we may also use, including the relevant information you provided when you contact the customer service, the questionnaire answering information you sent to us during the questionnaire survey.
label: Important
Usage
rewrite: We may use the information that you contact with customer service or fill in the questionnaire to improve service quality.

text: 1.5 Provide information display or push

We may share your information from the partners and other third parties to achieve the function of Youku Shengshi, so that you use the services you need, including providing data services (including online advertising monitoring, data statistics, data analysis) cooperationPartners, or third -party sharing of third parties such as partners who entrust us to promote, the purpose is to make these third parties understand the coverage and effectiveness of the promotion.
label: Third Party Sharing/ Disclosure
Important
Usage
rewrite: We may share your information from a partner and other third parties to provide the services you need normally.

text: For example, we may inform how many people in the third party have seen their promotional information or purchased the commodity of the client after seeing the information, or provide them with statistical information that cannot recognize personal identity to help them understand their audience or customers.
label: Third Party Sharing/ Disclosure
Important
Usage

text: 1.6 cookie and similar technologies

In order to provide you with a more personalized service experience and improve our services, we or our third -party partners may collect and use your information through cookies and similar technologies, and store these information as log information.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
rewrite: We or our third -party partners may collect and use your information through Cookie and similar technologies, and save this as a log message.

text: By using Cookie and similar technologies, we provide you with a more convenient, fast and personal service experience.
The above use may be used for: remember your identity, analyze your service situation, and advertise optimization.
label: Important
Usage
rewrite: Use cookie technology to remember your identity, analyze your usage, and advertise optimization.

text: While we use cookies and similar technologies for the above purposes, we may be provided to advertisers and other partners collected through cookie and similar technologies to analyze how users use Youku Shengshi services and send you to you mayInterested advertisements, or the effects of advertising services.
label: Third Party Sharing/ Disclosure
Important
First Party Collection Information
Usage

text: These third -party cookies and similar technologies are collected and used by such information that are not bound by this policy, but are subject to their own information protection statements. We are not responsible for third -party Cookie and similar technologies.
label: Third Party Sharing/ Disclosure
Important
Risk
rewrite: The collection and use information of third -party cookies and similar technologies are not subject to this policy, and we do not take responsibility for this.

text: 2. How do we share, transfer, and disclose your personal information
2.1 How do we share your information

We attach importance to the protection of your personal information. Under normal circumstances, except for the following situations, without your consent, we will not share your personal information with any third party other than the prosperous age of Youku:
